item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-08-09
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Shops at Prudential Center (800 Boylston Street, Boston). #
  • I'm at Kiehl's (112 Newbury Street, Clarendon Street, Boston). #
  • I'm at Tealuxe (108 Newbury St, at Clarendon St, Boston). #
  • I'm at South End Buttery (314 Shawmut Ave, Union Park, Boston). #
  • I'm at SoWa Market (Harrison ave, Boston). #
